rules.text: Be respectful. We treat each other with respect and grace, regardless of age, gender, nationality, previous history or race. This is designed to be the antithesis of Twitter: a safe space for exploring new means of self-expression.
If you must run a parody account, include the phrase "Parody Account" in your bio or risk account suspension.
The minimum age limit is 18. We are adults here and sometimes do say things a little inappropriate for children.
We do not condone hate speech.
